00026 B3_FORCE_INLINE void b3AabbExpand (b3Vector3& aabbMin,
00027                                                                    b3Vector3& aabbMax,
00028                                                                    const b3Vector3& expansionMin,
00029                                                                    const b3Vector3& expansionMax)
00030 {
00031         aabbMin = aabbMin + expansionMin;
00032         aabbMax = aabbMax + expansionMax;
00033 }
00034 
00036 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3TestPointAgainstAabb2(const b3Vector3 &aabbMin1, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax1,
00037                                                                 const b3Vector3 &point)
00038 {
00039         bool overlap = true;
00040         overlap = (aabbMin1.getX() > point.getX() || aabbMax1.getX() < point.getX()) ? false : overlap;
00041         overlap = (aabbMin1.getZ() > point.getZ() || aabbMax1.getZ() < point.getZ()) ? false : overlap;
00042         overlap = (aabbMin1.getY() > point.getY() || aabbMax1.getY() < point.getY()) ? false : overlap;
00043         return overlap;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00048 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3TestAabbAgainstAabb2(const b3Vector3 &aabbMin1, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax1,
00049                                                                 const b3Vector3 &aabbMin2, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax2)
00050 {
00051         bool overlap = true;
00052         overlap = (aabbMin1.getX() > aabbMax2.getX() || aabbMax1.getX() < aabbMin2.getX()) ? false : overlap;
00053         overlap = (aabbMin1.getZ() > aabbMax2.getZ() || aabbMax1.getZ() < aabbMin2.getZ()) ? false : overlap;
00054         overlap = (aabbMin1.getY() > aabbMax2.getY() || aabbMax1.getY() < aabbMin2.getY()) ? false : overlap;
00055         return overlap;
00056 }
00057 
00059 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3TestTriangleAgainstAabb2(const b3Vector3 *vertices,
00060                                                                         const b3Vector3 &aabbMin, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax)
00061 {
00062         const b3Vector3 &p1 = vertices[0];
00063         const b3Vector3 &p2 = vertices[1];
00064         const b3Vector3 &p3 = vertices[2];
00065 
00066         if (b3Min(b3Min(p1[0], p2[0]), p3[0]) > aabbMax[0]) return false;
00067         if (b3Max(b3Max(p1[0], p2[0]), p3[0]) < aabbMin[0]) return false;
00068 
00069         if (b3Min(b3Min(p1[2], p2[2]), p3[2]) > aabbMax[2]) return false;
00070         if (b3Max(b3Max(p1[2], p2[2]), p3[2]) < aabbMin[2]) return false;
00071   
00072         if (b3Min(b3Min(p1[1], p2[1]), p3[1]) > aabbMax[1]) return false;
00073         if (b3Max(b3Max(p1[1], p2[1]), p3[1]) < aabbMin[1]) return false;
00074         return true;
00075 }

00077 
00078 B3_FORCE_INLINE int     b3Outcode(const b3Vector3& p,const b3Vector3& halfExtent) 
00079 {
00080         return (p.getX()  < -halfExtent.getX() ? 0x01 : 0x0) |    
00081                    (p.getX() >  halfExtent.getX() ? 0x08 : 0x0) |
00082                    (p.getY() < -halfExtent.getY() ? 0x02 : 0x0) |    
00083                    (p.getY() >  halfExtent.getY() ? 0x10 : 0x0) |
00084                    (p.getZ() < -halfExtent.getZ() ? 0x4 : 0x0) |    
00085                    (p.getZ() >  halfExtent.getZ() ? 0x20 : 0x0);
00086 }

00089 
00090 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3RayAabb2(const b3Vector3& rayFrom,
00091                                                                   const b3Vector3& rayInvDirection,
00092                                                                   const unsigned int raySign[3],
00093                                                                   const b3Vector3 bounds[2],
00094                                                                   b3Scalar& tmin,
00095                                                                   b3Scalar lambda_min,
00096                                                                   b3Scalar lambda_max)
00097 {
00098         b3Scalar tmax, tymin, tymax, tzmin, tzmax;
00099         tmin = (bounds[raySign[0]].getX() - rayFrom.getX()) * rayInvDirection.getX();
00100         tmax = (bounds[1-raySign[0]].getX() - rayFrom.getX()) * rayInvDirection.getX();
00101         tymin = (bounds[raySign[1]].getY() - rayFrom.getY()) * rayInvDirection.getY();
00102         tymax = (bounds[1-raySign[1]].getY() - rayFrom.getY()) * rayInvDirection.getY();
00103 
00104         if ( (tmin > tymax) || (tymin > tmax) )
00105                 return false;
00106 
00107         if (tymin > tmin)
00108                 tmin = tymin;
00109 
00110         if (tymax < tmax)
00111                 tmax = tymax;
00112 
00113         tzmin = (bounds[raySign[2]].getZ() - rayFrom.getZ()) * rayInvDirection.getZ();
00114         tzmax = (bounds[1-raySign[2]].getZ() - rayFrom.getZ()) * rayInvDirection.getZ();
00115 
00116         if ( (tmin > tzmax) || (tzmin > tmax) )
00117                 return false;
00118         if (tzmin > tmin)
00119                 tmin = tzmin;
00120         if (tzmax < tmax)
00121                 tmax = tzmax;
00122         return ( (tmin < lambda_max) && (tmax > lambda_min) );
00123 }
00124 
00125 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3RayAabb(const b3Vector3& rayFrom, 
00126                                                                  const b3Vector3& rayTo, 
00127                                                                  const b3Vector3& aabbMin, 
00128                                                                  const b3Vector3& aabbMax,
00129                                           b3Scalar& param, b3Vector3& normal) 
00130 {
00131         b3Vector3 aabbHalfExtent = (aabbMax-aabbMin)* b3Scalar(0.5);
00132         b3Vector3 aabbCenter = (aabbMax+aabbMin)* b3Scalar(0.5);
00133         b3Vector3       source = rayFrom - aabbCenter;
00134         b3Vector3       target = rayTo - aabbCenter;
00135         int     sourceOutcode = b3Outcode(source,aabbHalfExtent);
00136         int targetOutcode = b3Outcode(target,aabbHalfExtent);
00137         if ((sourceOutcode & targetOutcode) == 0x0)
00138         {
00139                 b3Scalar lambda_enter = b3Scalar(0.0);
00140                 b3Scalar lambda_exit  = param;
00141                 b3Vector3 r = target - source;
00142                 int i;
00143                 b3Scalar        normSign = 1;
00144                 b3Vector3       hitNormal = b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00145                 int bit=1;
00146 
00147                 for (int j=0;j<2;j++)
00148                 {
00149                         for (i = 0; i != 3; ++i)
00150                         {
00151                                 if (sourceOutcode & bit)
00152                                 {
00153                                         b3Scalar lambda = (-source[i] - aabbHalfExtent[i]*normSign) / r[i];
00154                                         if (lambda_enter <= lambda)
00155                                         {
00156                                                 lambda_enter = lambda;
00157                                                 hitNormal.setValue(0,0,0);
00158                                                 hitNormal[i] = normSign;
00159                                         }
00160                                 }
00161                                 else if (targetOutcode & bit) 
00162                                 {
00163                                         b3Scalar lambda = (-source[i] - aabbHalfExtent[i]*normSign) / r[i];
00164                                         b3SetMin(lambda_exit, lambda);
00165                                 }
00166                                 bit<<=1;
00167                         }
00168                         normSign = b3Scalar(-1.);
00169                 }
00170                 if (lambda_enter <= lambda_exit)
00171                 {
00172                         param = lambda_enter;
00173                         normal = hitNormal;
00174                         return true;
00175                 }
00176         }
00177         return false;
00178 }

00182 B3_FORCE_INLINE void b3TransformAabb(const b3Vector3& halfExtents, b3Scalar margin,const b3Transform& t,b3Vector3& aabbMinOut,b3Vector3& aabbMaxOut)
00183 {
00184         b3Vector3 halfExtentsWithMargin = halfExtents+b3MakeVector3(margin,margin,margin);
00185         b3Matrix3x3 abs_b = t.getBasis().absolute();  
00186         b3Vector3 center = t.getOrigin();
00187     b3Vector3 extent = halfExtentsWithMargin.dot3( abs_b[0], abs_b[1], abs_b[2] );
00188         aabbMinOut = center - extent;
00189         aabbMaxOut = center + extent;
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 B3_FORCE_INLINE void b3TransformAabb(const b3Vector3& localAabbMin,const b3Vector3& localAabbMax, b3Scalar margin,const b3Transform& trans,b3Vector3& aabbMinOut,b3Vector3& aabbMaxOut)
00194 {
00195                 //b3Assert(localAabbMin.getX() <= localAabbMax.getX());
00196                 //b3Assert(localAabbMin.getY() <= localAabbMax.getY());
00197                 //b3Assert(localAabbMin.getZ() <= localAabbMax.getZ());
00198                 b3Vector3 localHalfExtents = b3Scalar(0.5)*(localAabbMax-localAabbMin);
00199                 localHalfExtents+=b3MakeVector3(margin,margin,margin);
00200 
00201                 b3Vector3 localCenter = b3Scalar(0.5)*(localAabbMax+localAabbMin);
00202                 b3Matrix3x3 abs_b = trans.getBasis().absolute();  
00203                 b3Vector3 center = trans(localCenter);
00204         b3Vector3 extent = localHalfExtents.dot3( abs_b[0], abs_b[1], abs_b[2] );
00205                 aabbMinOut = center-extent;
00206                 aabbMaxOut = center+extent;
00207 }

00209 #define B3_USE_BANCHLESS 1
00210 #ifdef B3_USE_BANCHLESS
00211         //This block replaces the block below and uses no branches, and replaces the 8 bit return with a 32 bit return for improved performance (~3x on XBox 360)
00212         B3_FORCE_INLINE unsigned b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(const unsigned short int* aabbMin1,const unsigned short int* aabbMax1,const unsigned short int* aabbMin2,const unsigned short int* aabbMax2)
00213         {               
00214                 return static_cast<unsigned int>(b3Select((unsigned)((aabbMin1[0] <= aabbMax2[0]) & (aabbMax1[0] >= aabbMin2[0])
00215                         & (aabbMin1[2] <= aabbMax2[2]) & (aabbMax1[2] >= aabbMin2[2])
00216                         & (aabbMin1[1] <= aabbMax2[1]) & (aabbMax1[1] >= aabbMin2[1])),
00217                         1, 0));
00218         }
00219 #else
00220         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool b3TestQuantizedAabbAgainstQuantizedAabb(const unsigned short int* aabbMin1,const unsigned short int* aabbMax1,const unsigned short int* aabbMin2,const unsigned short int* aabbMax2)
00221         {
00222                 bool overlap = true;
00223                 overlap = (aabbMin1[0] > aabbMax2[0] || aabbMax1[0] < aabbMin2[0]) ? false : overlap;
00224                 overlap = (aabbMin1[2] > aabbMax2[2] || aabbMax1[2] < aabbMin2[2]) ? false : overlap;
00225                 overlap = (aabbMin1[1] > aabbMax2[1] || aabbMax1[1] < aabbMin2[1]) ? false : overlap;
00226                 return overlap;
00227         }
00228 #endif //B3_USE_BANCHLESS

00230 #endif //B3_AABB_UTIL2
